text: Evan Almighty is a 2007 American comedy movie and a spin-off sequel to Bruce Almighty. It stars Steve Carell, Morgan Freeman, Molly Shannon, John Goodman, Wanda Sykes and Jonah Hill. It follows a congressman protecting the animals from a massive flood, after he was sent by God. It was released on June 22, 2007 to negative reviews. Category:2007 movies Category:American comedy movies
title: Evan Almighty
